name: image-rotator
title: Image Rotator
content:
Overview

This application rotates images by 90, 180, or 270 degrees clockwise without any quality loss. Built using Pillow, it uses lossless transpose operations for perfect rotation.

Features

  • Rotate by 90, 180, or 270 degrees clockwise
  • Lossless rotation operation
  • Preserves original file format
  • Maintains image quality

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Rotation Angle: Select 90, 180, or 270 degrees
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a rotated image with the suffix _rotated_[angle] in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Correcting image orientation from cameras
  • Rotating scanned documents
  • Adjusting images for proper display
  • Creating different viewing angles
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$RANDOM_$$RANDOM"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_rotator.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -r ${rotationAngle}
